org.quickserver.util.xmlreader
Class DefaultDataMode

java.lang.Object
  org.quickserver.util.xmlreader.DefaultDataMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DefaultDataMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class encapsulate default DataMode for ClientHandler. The xml is <default-data-mode>...</default-data-mode>

Since:
1.4.6
Author:
Akshathkumar Shetty
